If there are multiple results, please indicate them as XXX-XXX.

of H 2 O vapor, CO 2 and surface adsorbed H 2 O form HCO 3 -and release active species (denoted as init -in Eq. 1) participating in CO 2 reduction reaction 25 .The surface concentration of HCO 3 -in the equilibrium does not increase because CO 2 pressure can be seen as constant.This is consistent with the photocatalytic activity test in which Ce 0.6 Bi 0.4 O 2- shows much higher photocatalytic performance than CeO 2 (Fig. 1). The generation condition of the extraction is given: If Light_source is Solar or Solar Simulator, Lamp is always Solar Simulator.
